tool_description: Processes multiple documents simultaneously, detecting formats and converting them to a unified text format with progress tracking.

input_directory.description: Directory path containing documents to process

output_directory.description: Directory path for storing converted documents

max_files.description: Maximum number of files to process (0 for unlimited)

skip_existing.description: Whether to skip files that already exist in output directory

parallel_processing.description: Whether to enable parallel processing for faster conversion

error_messages: Invalid directory: Input or output directory does not exist or is not accessible.
Permission denied: Insufficient permissions to read input or write to output directory.
Invalid file pattern: One or more file patterns contain invalid syntax.
Invalid error handling: Use 'skip', 'stop', or 'log' for error_handling parameter.
Processing failed: Batch conversion encountered critical errors.
usage: Provide input_directory and output_directory, then configure processing options. The tool processes multiple files and provides comprehensive conversion results.

files_processed.description: Total number of files successfully processed

files_failed.description: Number of files that failed processing

failed_files.description: Array of filenames that failed processing
